Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mandarin Oriental MÃ¼nchen, you'll be centrally located in Munich, steps from Hofbrauhaus and minutes from Marienplatz. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Munich Kammerspiele Schauspielhaus and Isar Tor.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 73 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a health club, a steam room, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Munich? This hotel has 3229 square feet (300 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Mandarin Oriental MÃ¼nchen is Munich (MUC-Franz Josef Strauss Intl.) - 28.6 km / 17.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mandarin Oriental Munich is Munich (MUC-Franz Josef Strauss Intl.) - 28.9 km / 17.9 mi.
